roleset.name: complain about
roleset.note: OBJECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'object' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from object.01-v predicate notes)
OBJECTION-N NOTES: Based on verb entry object.01 (differs from verb frame in presence of arg2 recipient), corresponds to VN entry complain-37.8. Framed by Claire. (from objection.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Moreover, Mr. Guber claims, Mr. Semel told him that Mr. Ross probably wouldn't object ``if it were anybody other than Sony.
example.arg: if it were anybody other than Sony

example.name: both args
example.text: Meeting in Strasbourg Wednesday, [the commission]-1 voted, as expected, *trace*-1 to formally object to the accord between Air France, the state-owned airline, and state-controlled domestic carrier Air Inter.
example.arg: to the accord between Air France, the state-owned airline, and state-controlled domestic carrier Air Inter

example.name: tricky intransitive
example.text: Rural Solidarity objected, to no avail, when Solidarity leader Lech Walesa accepted the Peasants' support.
example.arg: when Solidarity leader Lech Walesa accepted the Peasants' support

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Conca repeated in his sentencing memorandum the same arguments made in his objection to the plea deal that he was not treated as an adult but as a youthful offender.
example.arg: to the plea deal that he was not treated as an adult but as a youthful offender.

example.name: Gol for antibenfactive or entity hearing the objection
example.text: In her objection to the judge, Mrs. Steele demanded to know who Fairfax's accomplices are so she can protect herself from them.

example.name: Compare to previous example
example.text: The plaintiff did not thereby give up her objection to the judge's failure to disqualify Mr. Seivert.
example.arg: to the judge's failure to disqualify Mr. Seivert.

roleset.name: offensive
roleset.note: OBJECTIONABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data, object-v.01, objection-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls complain-37.8. (from objectionable.01-j)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Before the jury was seated, the appellant named two additional venire members who were objectionable to him.
